name: Combo Ginebra
description:
'''Combo Ginebra''' is a Chilean musical ensemble of the [[New Chilean Cumbia]] style. The band emerged in 2004 as a traditional [[Gypsy style|gypsy music]] duo featuring Álvaro Pacheco and Juan Pablo Cabello. The duo soon began incorporating [[cumbia]] rhythms into their repertoire and were joined by other instrumentalists to form a cumbia ensemble band.

Combo Ginebra is currently one of the mainstays of [[Santiago]]’s cumbia music scene and they regularly perform to lively crowds at venues such as the [[Galpón Víctor Jara]] ([[Victor Jara]] “Warehouse”) and the [[Fonda Permanente]].
